data.title: Apple TV to Enable Link Sharing with tvOS 18 Update
data.meta_description: Apple TV's upcoming tvOS 18 update will allow users to share links directly to nearby iPhones, enhancing connectivity and user experience.
data.text:
Apple is set to enhance the functionality of Apple TV with the upcoming tvOS 18 update. The latest developer beta reveals that users will soon be able to share links directly from Apple TV to nearby iPhones. This feature aims to improve user connectivity and streamline content sharing between devices.

Link Sharing Capability

The new link-sharing feature, highlighted in a preview by journalist Sigmund Judge, demonstrates Apple TV’s ability to send links via AirDrop to nearby iPhones. This functionality allows users to open websites or follow recommendations effortlessly. Previously, the YouTube app on Apple TV was the only platform offering a similar feature, allowing advertisers to send links to iPhones. However, tvOS 18 will expand this capability across all apps.

Enhanced User Experience

Integrating link sharing directly into tvOS 18 means any app can potentially include this feature. For example, Apple TV shows could send links to rent related titles or purchase related books. Additionally, immersive videos, such as those for Apple Vision Pro, can be easily shared with an iPhone for a more interactive experience.

Complementary Features

Alongside link sharing, tvOS 18 introduces several new features aimed at enhancing user experience. One notable addition is InSight, which displays details of music used in TV shows. This feature allows users to purchase the music directly on their iPhones, further integrating Apple’s ecosystem.

Developer Insights

The latest developer beta of tvOS 18 indicates Apple’s commitment to improving user connectivity and inter-device functionality. Developers now have more tools to create seamless experiences across Apple’s product lineup. By enabling link sharing, Apple TV becomes a more versatile and user-friendly device.

The upcoming tvOS 18 update marks a significant step forward for Apple TV. With the new link-sharing feature, users can expect a more connected and interactive experience. As Apple continues to refine and enhance its products, the integration between Apple TV and other devices is set to become even more seamless and efficient.
